pkgmetadata.longdescription:
All USB Bluetooth >= v2.1 dongles support a feature called secure simple pairing, or "SSP".
Unfortunately this can cause problems with Bluetooth keyboards, which often fail to reassociate.
This package provides a small daemon which will monitor all Bluetooth adaptors and disable SSP on them when it sees them.
Please note that this version is only packaged for OpenRC, not (yet) systemd.
